“I helped others heal—until my job disappeared overnight.”

When the U.S. froze USAID funding in Kenya, more than 40,000 health workers were suddenly laid off.

Joseph Okutoyi, a father of five and HIV counsellor, was one of them.
He knew his clients by name—slum dwellers, single https://t.co/zAV0nTLbyC
